name: Origin - The Big Bang
description:
As a world operator, evolving species, exploring galaxies, developing science, developing dark capabilities.

【Species evolution】
From the smallest particles start, through the synthesis, replication and acceleration, step by step
evolved into DNA, paramecium, big white shark!

【Galaxy exploration】
From the discovery of the smallest dust to the satellite, planets, the solar system, and even the universe!

【Development science】
Enhance the brain capacity, extend the nervous system, with a strong wisdom to develop science.

【Research and development of dark magic】
How do you find mysterious dark matter? What is the use of dark matter? There are more powerful
forces in the universe waiting for us to dig.

This game has been licensed by Evan, the author of "Swarm Simulator"
